recommended_degree: Teknologi Informasi, Sistem informasi, Teknik Informatika (Sarjana)
job_description:
Job Description: 
- Conduct testing on the application/website, including both positive and negative scenarios 

Additional Requirements: 
- Basic knowledge terkait QA/Software Tester 
- Attention to Detail 
- Analytical Thinking 
- Willing to be placed in Kelapa Gading, Jakarta Utara 
- Willing to Work From Office (Monday-Friday)
